name: Parkour Circuit UQ
tasks: Static standing
Stand upright with arms relaxed by your side.
Jump
Using both legs
do a 5 jumps
Lying on bed on back.
Lie on the bed
on your back. Don't cross your legs
Cycle through different natural postures you sleep in
Start lying on your back
and then roll over to the side. Hold each position for 10 seconds.
Sit up (from lying)
sit with legs over the edge of the bed.
Starting from lying on your back
Bend down and tie shoelace of shoes
Bend forward to tie up a shoelace. Keep your feet on the floor.
Provide a shoe if participant is not wearing a laced shoe.
Sit up straight
Start bent forward as if you're tying up the shoe
then straighten up to sit up straight.
Stand up and turn around to face the bed
Stand up from the bed and turn around 180 degrees to face the bed. Keep your arms to your sides.
Cover the bed with the sheet
Cover the bed with the sheet. Please use both hands.
Stack the pillows
Place the pillow in a neat stack at the head of the bed. Please use both hands to hold each pillow.
Turn around and switch off the light.
Use your right hand to switch off the light at the wall switch.
Turn and walk (<10m) to high shelf
Walk at your natural pace to the shelves in the kitchen.
Open the shelf door with right arm
Open the door of the high shelf with your right hand. Keep your left hand to your side or in your pocket.
Make sure there are 5 items on the shelf for the subject to pick.
Take items from the shelf and place on bench right arm
Use your right hand to take items from the shelf and place them on the bench.
Take items from the bench and place on shelf right arm
Use your right hand to take items from the bench and return them to the shelf.
Close the shelf door right arm
Close the door of the high shelf with your right hand. Keep your left hand to your side or in your pocket.
Open the shelf door with left arm
Open the door of the high shelf with your left hand. Keep your right hand to your side or in your pocket.
Take items from the shelf and place on bench left arm
Use your left hand to take items from the shelf and place them on the bench.
Take items from the shelf and place on shelf left arm
Use your left hand to take items from the bench and return them to the shelf.
Close the shelf door left arm
Close the door of the high shelf with your left hand. Keep your right hand to your side or in your pocket.
Use both hands to open the shelf door
move items to the bench
move them back again
Walk and stand infront of the fridge
Walk at your natural pace to stand in front of the fridge
Open the fridge door with your right hand.
Open the door of the fridge with your right hand. Keep your left hand to your side or in your pocket.
Bend down
pick a bottle from the low shelf and place it on the bench with right hand
Bend at the hips and use your right hand to take a bottle from the bottom shelf and place it on the bench. Don't squat with your legs.
Close the fridge door with right hand
Keep your left hand in your pocket or simply let it hang to your side.
Make sure there is a bottle in the lower shelf.
Open the fridge door with your left hand.
Open the door of the fridge with your left hand. Keep your right hand to your side or in your pocket.
Bend down
pick a bottle from the low shelf and place it on the bench with lefthand
Bend at the hips and use your left hand to take a bottle from the bottom shelf and place it on the bench. Don't squat with your legs.
Close the fridge door with left hand
Close the door of the fridge with your left hand. Keep your right hand to your side or in your pocket.
Use either/both hands to open fridge and move two bottles from fridge to bench
and close fridge
Use either or both hands to open the fridge door
Walk to the bench and stand in front of the cup
Walk to stand in front of the bench where the cup is.
Make sure there is a cup and a jug/bottle on the bench
Hold cup with left hand and pour the content of the jar into the cup with your right hand
Hold cup with left hand and pour liquid from the jug into the cup with your right hand
Walking to table holding cup in right hand
While holding the cup with the right hand
walk to the table and place the cup on the table.
Pull chair with right hand and sit down
Pull out the chair with your right hand and sit down at the chair.
Sit with arms resting on the table.
Sit naturally with your arms resting on the table.
Simulate drinking from the cup with your right hand.
Hold the cup with your right hand and pretend to drink
Simulate drinking from the cup with your left hand.
Hold the cup with your left hand and pretend to drink
Make sure there is a keyboard on the table
Type a sentence on the keyboard
Type the following sentences on the keyboard The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
Make sure there is a pen and a paper on the table
Writing a sentence with a pen and paper.
Pick up the pen and write Write with a pen on the piece of paper
Stand from chair.
Stand up from the chair.
Walk to the boxes
Walk at your natural pace over to stand in front of the boxes.
Make sure there are boxes by the couch
Bend over and lift the light (0.5kg) box with both arms
Without squatting
bend at the hips and lift up the light box with both arms
Carry box to the table
While carrying the box
walk over to the table.
Place box on the table
Place the box on the table.
Walk to the other box
Walk back over to stand in front of the other box.
Bend over and lift the heavy (5kg) box with both arms
Without squatting
bend at the hips and lift up the heavy box with both arms
Carry box to the table
While carrying the box
walk over to the table.
Place box on the table
Place the box on the table.
Walk to the grocery bag
Walk over to stand next ot the grocery bag.
Make sure there is a grocery bag close to the couch.
Bend over and pick the grocery bag from the floor with your left hand.
Without squatting
bend at the hips and grab the grocery bag with your left hand
Carry grocery bag to kitchen bench
While carrying the grocery bag
walk over to the kitchen bench.
Place bag on bench
Place the grocery bag up on the bench.
Use your right hand to pick out items from the bag and place it on the bench.
Use your left hand to keep the bag open and use your right hand to remove all items from the bag and place them on the bench.
Walk to the chair and sit down.
Walk back to the chair and sit down at the chair.
Make sure there is a chair away from the able.
Pick up the object on the floor in front of you with you right hand.
Bend over to pick up the object on the floor in front of you with your right hand. Keep your left hand on your thigh or by your side.
Pick up the object on the floor in front of you with you left hand.
Bend over to pick up the object on the floor in front of you with your left hand. Keep your right hand on your thigh or by your side.
Pick up the object on the floor to your right side.
Bend to the right to pick up the object on the floor to your right with your right hand. Keep your left hand on your thigh or by your side.
Pick up the object on the floor to your left side.
Bend to the left to pick up the object on the floor to your left with your left hand. Keep your right hand on your thigh or by your side.
Twist right grasp object with left hand and return to centre
By twisting your torso
pick up the object to your right with your left hand and place it in front of you.
Twist right grasp object with left hand and return to centre
By twisting your torso
pick up the object to your left with your right hand and place it in front of you.
Stand up from the chair
Stand up from the chair.
Walk to the couch
Walk at your natural pace over to the couch.
Sit on the couch
Sit down on the couch.
Lie back into a relaxed posture on the couch.
Lie back into a relaxed posture on the couch.
Stand up from the couch
Stand up from the couch
Walk to the kitchen sink
Walk to the kitchen sink
Simulate turning on the tap with your left hand
Simulate turning on the tap with your left hand
placing your right hand on the bench.
Simulate washing hands
Pretend you're washing your hands
Simulate wiping your hands dry.
Pretend you're wiping your hands dry.
Walk (10+ m of straightline walking)
Walk down to the end of this hallway.
Turn and walk back
Turn around and walk back to the start of the hallway.
Look down.
While standing
bend your neck forward to look down at your feet.
Look to the right
While standing
turn your neck to look over your right shoulder.
Look to the left
While standing
turn your neck to look over your left shoulder.
Bend neck to the right
While standing
bend your neck to the side to get your right ear close to your right shoulder.
Bend neck to the left
While standing
bend your neck to the side to get your left ear close to your left shoulder.
Descend stairs
Walk down this flight of stairs
Ascend stairs
Walk back up this flight of stairs.
Jog/Run
Jog along this hallway
Jump
Using both legs
do a 5 jumps
